sentences.en: Despite the mud outside, the earthen floor was clean.
sentences.cn: 尽管外面泥泞，屋内的泥土地面还是很干净。

sentences.en: I didn't know what was put in this earthen jar.
sentences.cn: 我不知道这个砂罐里装的是什么东西.

sentences.en: I shall do what I can, my Master, said the earthen lamp.
sentences.cn: 瓦灯说道:“我要尽我所能地做去, 我的主人. ”

sentences.en: On top of this earthen structure stood a deep, round, iron cauldron.
sentences.cn: 在这土灶的上面,墩着一口又圆又深的大铁锅.

sentences.en: Painted earthen animals are rich in color and good for collection.
sentences.cn: 彩陶动物,色彩丰富,收藏佳品.

sentences.en: The earthen pot is glazed inside.
The earthen pot must keep clear of the brass vessel.
The faces of these men were earthen in hue.
sentences.cn: 那些人的面色都是土色的.

sentences.en: The ksar, a group of earthen buildings surrounded by high walls, is a traditional pre - Saharan habitat.
sentences.cn: 阿伊特·本·哈杜筑垒村指的是一组由高墙围起来的土制建筑, 这是一处典型的前撒哈拉居民聚居区.

sentences.en: The quietness of the chapel cased away noises from the earthen world.
sentences.cn: 教堂的寂静把外面的嘈杂关在了门外.

sentences.en: There is a temple on that reasonable well - known earthen hill.
sentences.cn: 在那座小有名气的土山上有一座庙.

sentences.en: Those earthen pots are made by the skilled man.
sentences.cn: 那些陶壶是那个熟练工做的.

sentences.en: Though an earthen vessel, it held so great a treasure.
sentences.cn: 只是一只泥土器皿, 但里面装的却是一件稀世奇珍.

sentences.en: While the glass lamp rebukes the earthen for calling it cousin.
sentences.cn: 玻璃灯责备瓦灯叫他表兄.

sentences.en: You'd better use an earthen pot to plant flowers.
sentences.cn: 种花最好还是使用瓦盆.
